description: A task to generate a report of installed and missing Windows updates.

pswindowsupdateurl.description: A http url of the PSWindowsUpdate module zip file.

wsusscnurl.description: A http url of the WSUSscn2.cab file.

wsusscnforcedownload.description: Specify this parameter if you want to force the redownload of the WSUSscnURL.cab. This will overwrite the existing copy (if any).

pswindowsupdateforcedownload.description: Specify this parameter if you want to force the redownload of the PSWindowsUpdate module zip. This will overwrite the existing copy (if any).

downloaddirectory.description: Location of where to download the PSWindowsUpdate.zip and WSUSscnURL.cab files.
